data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Xingtai, Hebei, China. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xingtai, Hebei, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Xingtai, Hebei, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Xingtai, Hebei, China to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 105,121 believers living in Xingtai, Hebei, China.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Xingtai
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Xingtai, Hebei, China.
Spirit, guide seekers in Xingtai, Hebei, China to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Xingtai, Hebei, China so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the county of Xingtai, Hebei, China has a population of 1,385,700.

We estimate Xingtai has 105,121 people who might know Jesus, 22,386 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,258,193 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,258,193, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.
